response.original_title: Littlest Pet Shop: Best Pet Friends
response.overview: You Canâ€™t Have Adventure Without Your Best Pet Friends!  Blythe and her very best pet friends (Russell the Hedgehog, Pepper the Skunk, Zoe the Spaniel, Minka the Monkey, Sunil the Mongoose, Penny the Panda and Vinnie the Gecko) are off to have brand-new adventures! But relationships are put to the test. Can the gang pass? Only if they work together!
